description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的侄子，文化大革命时期的重要人物。
description.en: Chinese politician, nephew of Mao Zedong, and a key figure during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人，毛远新的伯伯。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army, and the uncle of Mao Yuanxin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东之弟，毛远新之父。
description.en: Chinese politician, younger brother of Mao Zedong, and father of Mao Yuanxin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛远新之母。
description.en: Chinese politician, mother of Mao Yuanxin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，方志敏的堂弟，毛远新的继父。
description.en: Chinese politician, cousin of Fang Zhimin, and stepfather of Mao Yuanxin.

description.zh-cn: 毛远新的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Mao Yuanxin.

description.zh-cn: 毛远新与全秀凤的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Mao Yuanxin and Quan Xiufeng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的妻子，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, wife of Mao Zedong, and a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间因反对个人崇拜和“四人帮”而被处决的政治人物。
description.en: A political figure executed during the Cultural Revolution for opposing the personality cult and the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期新疆省的统治者。
description.en: Ruler of Xinjiang Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任，参与粉碎“四人帮”的行动。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, who participated in the action to crush the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 毛远新的出生地，现为乌鲁木齐。
description.en: Mao Yuanxin's birthplace, now known as Ürümqi.

en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设的七个大军区之一。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间辽宁省的权力机构。
description.en: The governing body of Liaoning Province during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事工程学院

description.zh-cn: 毛远新曾就读的军事院校，今为中国人民解放军国防科技大学。
description.en: The military academy where Mao Yuanxin studied, now known as the National University of Defense Technology.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的中学，毛远新曾在此就读。
description.en: A middle school in Beijing, China, where Mao Yuanxin studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的学校，毛远新曾在此就读。
description.en: A school in Beijing, China, where Mao Yuanxin studied.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命后期，王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元在中共中央政治局内结成的政治集团。
description.en: A political faction composed of Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan within the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee during the later stages of the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 辽宁省沈阳市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 辽宁省沈阳市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省沈阳市的中级人民法院，曾审判毛远新案。
description.en: The intermediate people's court in Shenyang, Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China, which tried the case of Mao Yuanxin.

en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 上海汽车工业质量检测研究所

zh-cn: 上海汽车工业质量检测研究所
en: Shanghai Automotive Industry Quality Inspection and Research Institute

description.zh-cn: 毛远新刑满释放后曾在此工作。
description.en: The workplace of Mao Yuanxin after his release from prison.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指1976年10月6日，华国锋、叶剑英、汪东兴等人于北京中南海怀仁堂发动军事政变，逮捕“四人帮”及其骨干成员的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event on October 6, 1976, when Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, Wang Dongxing and others launched a military coup at Huirentang, Zhongnanhai, Beijing, arresting the 'Gang of Four' and their key members.

en: Zhang Tiesheng's Blank Exam Paper Incident

description.zh-cn: 1973年高等学校招生考试中，考生张铁生在物理化学考试中几乎交白卷，但在背后写信，被毛远新和江青等人树为“反潮流”典型。
description.en: In the 1973 college entrance examination, candidate Zhang Tiesheng submitted an almost blank paper for the physics and chemistry exam but wrote a letter on the back, which was praised as an 'anti-current' model by Mao Yuanxin, Jiang Qing and others.

en: Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动的，针对邓小平主持的1975年全面整顿的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement initiated by Mao Zedong targeting the comprehensive rectification of 1975 led by Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 1975年在中国辽宁省海城县发生的一次7.3级强烈地震，因成功预报而大幅减少了伤亡。
description.en: A magnitude 7.3 earthquake that occurred in Haicheng, Liaoning Province, China in 1975, with casualties significantly reduced due to a successful prediction.

description.zh-cn: 1976年清明节期间，在北京天安门广场发生的，以悼念周恩来为名义的大规模群众抗议运动。
description.en: A large-scale mass protest movement that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, during the Qingming Festival in 1976, ostensibly to mourn Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 方志纯是毛远新的继父。
description.en: Fang Zhichun was Mao Yuanxin's stepfather.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是毛远新的伯伯。
description.en: Mao Zedong was Mao Yuanxin's uncle (father's elder brother).

description.zh-cn: 1942年9月，新疆省主席盛世才下令逮捕毛泽民，并于1943年将其处决。
description.en: In September 1942, Sheng Shicai, the governor of Xinjiang Province, ordered the arrest of Mao Zemin and had him executed in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 1942年9月，新疆省主席盛世才下令将年幼的毛远新与其母亲朱旦华一同羁押在监狱，直至1946年获释。
description.en: In September 1942, Sheng Shicai, the governor of Xinjiang Province, ordered the infant Mao Yuanxin and his mother Zhu Danhua to be imprisoned until their release in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，毛远新组织造反团，并担任辽宁省革命委员会副主任等要职，成为重要政治人物。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Mao Yuanxin organized rebel groups and held important positions such as vice-chairman of the Liaoning Provincial Revolutionary Committee, becoming a key political figure.

description.zh-cn: 江青扶助毛远新担任了辽宁省革命委员会副主任、沈阳军区政治部副主任、辽宁省军区政委等职务。
description.en: Jiang Qing supported Mao Yuanxin in assuming positions such as Vice-Chairman of the Liaoning Provincial Revolutionary Committee, Deputy Director of the Political Department of the Shenyang Military Region, and Political Commissar of the Liaoning Military District.

description.zh-cn: 毛远新与江青关系亲近，在家中时，毛远新喊江青做“妈妈”，江青喊毛远新“小豆子”。
description.en: Mao Yuanxin had a close relationship with Jiang Qing, calling her 'Mama' at home, while she called him 'Xiaodouzi'.

description.zh-cn: 毛远新配合江青以“张铁生交白卷事件”和“华北农大搬迁事件”向周恩来发难。
description.en: Mao Yuanxin collaborated with Jiang Qing to challenge Zhou Enlai using the 'Zhang Tiesheng's Blank Exam Paper Incident' and the 'North China Agricultural University Relocation Incident'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共辽宁省委常委扩大会议上，毛远新下令处决张志新，并指示在行刑时割喉。
description.en: At an expanded meeting of the Standing Committee of the Liaoning Provincial Party Committee, Mao Yuanxin ordered the execution of Zhang Zhixin and instructed that her throat be cut during the execution.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，毛远新被毛泽东指定为中央政治局联络员，代表毛泽东发表“最高指示”。
description.en: In 1975, Mao Yuanxin was appointed by Mao Zedong as the liaison for the Central Politburo, conveying Mao's 'supreme instructions'.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，毛远新向毛泽东报告称邓小平否定“文化大革命”，引发了“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动；1976年，毛远新在四五天安门事件后向毛泽东报告“邓小平是天安门事件的总后台”，导致邓小平被撤销一切职务。
description.en: In 1975, Mao Yuanxin reported to Mao Zedong that Deng Xiaoping was negating the 'Cultural Revolution', triggering the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist' movement; in 1976, after the Tiananmen Incident, Mao Yuanxin reported to Mao Zedong that 'Deng Xiaoping was the backstage supporter of the Tiananmen Incident', leading to Deng's dismissal from all posts.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮和毛远新联合起来对邓小平主持的“全面整顿”发难。
description.en: The Gang of Four, along with Mao Yuanxin, launched an attack on the 'comprehensive rectification' led by Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 在听取毛远新汇报与邓小平的矛盾后，毛泽东决心发动“反击右倾翻案风”运动。
description.en: After hearing Mao Yuanxin's report on the conflict with Deng Xiaoping, Mao Zedong decided to launch the 'Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend' movement.

description.zh-cn: 怀仁堂事变后，毛远新被中共中央宣布“保护审查”并遭拘捕。
description.en: After the Huirentang Incident, Mao Yuanxin was placed under 'protective custody' by the CPC Central Committee and arrested.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央办公厅主任汪东兴派人执行了对毛远新的拘捕行动。
description.en: Wang Dongxing, then Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, dispatched personnel to carry out the arrest of Mao Yuanxin.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央批准将毛远新永远开除党籍，并撤销其党内外一切职务。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee approved the permanent expulsion of Mao Yuanxin from the party and the removal of all his positions inside and outside the party.

relationships.source: 辽宁省沈阳市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 判处毛远新有期徒刑17年，剥夺政治权利4年。
description.en: Sentenced Mao Yuanxin to 17 years in prison and deprived him of political rights for 4 years.

position.zh-cn: 政治委员、政治部副主任
position.en: Political Commissar, Deputy Director of the Political Department

relationships.target: 上海汽车工业质量检测研究所

position.en: Director of the Chief Engineer's Office

description.zh-cn: 作为辽宁省委领导，果断决策发布地震预报，指挥群众疏散，大幅减少了地震造成的伤亡。
description.en: As a leader of the Liaoning Provincial Party Committee, he decisively ordered the issuance of an earthquake forecast and directed the evacuation of the public, significantly reducing casualties.
